concept.title: Translation
concept.shortdesc: How to insert translation for sentences

conbody.p: You can insert the translations for a single sentence in the bar below the Text Editor

In a new text this bar is empty. Click the sentence you would like to translate and click the white bar to write your translation in it. Be sure to have selected the right language in the drop-down menu on the right. ( : de, en, fr, es, ru). Then just type your translation for this sentence. In the standard view only one line wil be visible. Scroll up and down with the black triangles (on the right of the bar) if you need to see more. The complete translation of the text (as far as it is entered) will appear on the right of your BTS screen in the header of the Annotation window (BUG: currently you have to refresh the view of your text to see the complete translation).
